website_summaries.verdict: Door sweep with a nylon brush insert that looks great and will keep all kinds of contaminants and particles outside.
pros: Aluminum finish on the door sweep will give you a good level of longevity
Nylon brush will maintain its flexibility in all kinds of temperatures
Bristles on the brush are thicker than they look, ensuring they'll keep debris out of the home
Easier to install than some other door sweeps
cons: Brush insert looks nice, but doesn't deliver quite the energy efficiency of vinyl

customer_reviews.title: This one has 1 inch bristles (actually a tad more) in a holder that let me make adjustments for perfect fit. They are a thick en
customer_reviews.text: I really struggled finding the right solution for an unheated home office closet door. The filled sock type device was effective, but a pain for a frequently used door. But my door gap was wickedly tall and nothing I found at the home center had long enough bristles. This one has 1 inch bristles (actually a tad more) in a holder that let me make adjustments for perfect fit. They are a thick enough pelt of bristles to stop draft totally. In my application, these are absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nowlen

customer_reviews.title: Alternative Use for this Product
customer_reviews.text: I DIY'ed a desk with a cutout for cords. I used two of these to fill in the cutout. I love the look, but the fibers aren't stiff enough to hold their shape. So after a few weeks of use, the area in which the bulk of the cords come through is kind of messy. But, all in all, it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Morris

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, make sure to crimp the brush before cutting otherwise the bristles start falling out quickly. Easy to install. I installed it on the outside of a swing-in entry door, combined with a rubber stop on the back. This part helps keep out dirt, bugs, and maybe some air.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: This sweep was perfect! I have uneven floors
customer_reviews.text: Going into winter I was determined to address some drafts around the doors. This sweep was perfect! I have uneven floors. Nothing's level or plumb around here. But I was able to install this sweep to close the gaps and look good. Also, it doesn't seem to be doing any damage to the floor. I was afraid I'd get a semicircle outlining the door's path over time, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Works great on condo  entrance door off interior hallway
customer_reviews.text: We used this on an entrance door to our high rise condo. Cooking and smoking odors, breezes and sounds were filtering in under the door. Since we have a small area rug in the entrance hall, most door sweep and foam insulation would not work. We thought we would five this a try. It arrived quickly. It fit the door width perfectly. The grey color is very unobtrusive. An because it has bristles, it goes over the entrance rug with no difficulty. Most importantly, it absolutely blocks the smells, sounds and breezes. For our purposes, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for uneven floors and doorsills
customer_reviews.text: I held off on this because I wanted to see it perform. I applied it several months ago before winter. I just had 15-30 mile an hour winds and rain go through here for 2 days. It was better than I hoped for. It is a very uneven floor and made heating my workshop almost impossible. I can say, after most of a fairly wet and windy winter, that this is what I needed. My workshop is dry, no drafts from that doorway, to coin a phrase, "it sealed the deal". I'd recommend it to anyone with a tough door and floor to work with It was very easy to install and trim.
customer_reviews.author: John Oswald

customer_reviews.title: Works great, one little issue.
customer_reviews.text: We have an area rug and other rubber sweeps would catch and make the door SO HARD to open and close. This works great and is far easier to open and close the door. It still is stiff but so much better. The only complaint is that after a week of opening and closing the door the sweep started to slide out of the channel in the aluminum bracket. I had to take a hammer and tap the ends to create a stop that would not allow the brush to slide out. Other than that it does work well, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Boas House

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We have a door that opens over a flagstone surface, not flat. Normal sweeps with solid rubber/plastic seals don't work. This cut the drafts and leaves no openings when the door is closed. While not perfect (the uneven surface means the door doesn't open totally), this is the best we've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Cate Francis, Author

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bugs out.
customer_reviews.text: I extracted the brush part from the metal holding so I could cut the thing down and bond it to the door frame. It works very well on 3 different doors and keeps unwanted bugs from entering the room. Also does a good job on uneven floors to keep the draft out. I like the fact that for one of the doors I used this on, the bristles of the brush sits smooshed against the uneven floor and yet is completely fine when the door opens. The bristles doesn't permanently change shapes... yet... for now, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joho

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Sweep
customer_reviews.text: My front door sweep wore out. I bought this and pulled the sweep out of the moulding, cut it to size, and installed on my front door existing moulding. Works great. Really cleans the floor tiles as it opens and closes.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Cimorelli

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much nicer than anything I'd seen before finally finding these, I think you'd like it too.
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to find locally, so very happy to get these. Bought two for front door(s) that some moronic carpenter cut too short! These fill in the ugly gap nicely. Before I found these, I had one of those plastic U shaped things shoved under the doors, and of course they did not fully open. If you need to cut the metal, easy peasy. I used a hack saw--but do be careful not to cut the strip the bristles are attached to, because they will come out in small pieces--had to pinch the cut end with pliers, now it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a screen door (wooden). It was extremely easy to install and is seemingly very effective at sealing the bottom of the door.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hendry

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable. Good design for opening over a mud rug.
customer_reviews.text: High quality sturdy aluminum frame, and the bristles are held in place by a very stiff piece of twisted metal wire. Much more rugged/durable than the plastic sweep it's replacing. Was easy to cut to size with a hack saw (for the frame) and lineman pliers (for the brush). Easy to install. The design is great for cases where a door has to open over an area rug. In my case, the bristles are set even with the tile floor but have no problem clearing a 1/2" mud rug that the door swings over as it opens.
customer_reviews.author: Edward BarnettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Did not use on door
customer_reviews.text: Did not use on door but for my needs I cut it to length and mounted to a small computer/server/network switch cable for cable management. A lot cheaper this way then buying a pre-made brush cable grommet. This is a well made product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pemko Door Bottom Sweep
customer_reviews.text: A Perfect Solution for a new door. The door couldn't fit flush with the floor due to the room being built on a slight slant for the purpose of drainage from a large back porch. Sometimes heavy rains could cause the outdoor room to acquire a minimum amount of water. The room has now been enclosed and the Pemko Door Bottom Sweep is great.
customer_reviews.author: Audre Jones

customer_reviews.title: good old reliable. Pemco
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked closer, I think there is a model that has a "rain hood" over the brush, that would make it look more like other sweeps on the existing buildings doors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Critters Out
customer_reviews.text: I watched a field mouse try to gain access to the building but couldn't get past the brush on this sweep. It perfectly mat chews the OEM sweep but cost 1/2 as much.
customer_reviews.author: The Building Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: May cost a little more than the cheap ones out there but this is very sturdy and works great. This is the second on I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Decent door sweep
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to install, and comes with clear instructions. I put it on the bottom of my storm door to close a gap. I wish it had a heavier more commercial grade nylon brush but it is what it is and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robinette

customer_reviews.title: BRISTLE SWEEPS ARE THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THEN THE RUBBER BOTTOMS BY FAR. THE BRISTLES CONFORM TO THE FLOOR MUCH BETTER THEN A RUBBER SWEEP. I KNOW I’D A DOOR MAKER. AND A GOD
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Boss

customer_reviews.title: I can still feel a slight draft after installing this ...
customer_reviews.text: I can still feel a slight draft after installing this on the doors that lead into my house. However, it did significant reduce the draft that had been there before. Also, unlike that plastic door sweeps, these don't get stuck when you open and close the door.
customer_reviews.author: J704581

customer_reviews.title: Best door sweep available!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best type of door sweep. I've been using the door sweeps with the rubber gaskets on them, but those wear out and are always coming out of the track because of the movement across the floor. These have bristles instead of a rubber strip, and provide for a much better (and better looking) sweep.
customer_reviews.author: B. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to install. You may have to trim the length but that's easy with a hacksaw. We bought two to seal the bottom of a commercial double door with an uneven threshold plate. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J USA

customer_reviews.title: Made well.
customer_reviews.text: Used on the bottom of doors entering my screened in porch. They work fine on keeping the bugs out. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mace

customer_reviews.title: This sweep went on an interior door to reduce the ...
customer_reviews.text: This sweep went on our interior door to reduce the draft from this unheated mud room. The flooring is tile so we did want to scratch it on this high use door. This item works quite well and we would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn & Sandy Aronson

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs better screws that don't strip out.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps out the drafts but a little tricky to install. The screws strip out pretty easily which seems pretty common with almost everything these days. I replaced them with screws I bought at the hardware store and it went on the door much better.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl U

customer_reviews.title: We have had this one for like 4 months now and it works great
customer_reviews.text: We have a uneven slate floor in our home that tore up a traditional rubber door bottom sweep. We have had this one for like 4 months now and it works great! We open this door probably 10 times a day in winter and CONSTANTLY in spring and summer. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Poorest Delivery Yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Package came boxed up but the item was oper inside. Was advertised and marked as aluminum with black brush, brush was gray. Screws as listed on the contents were melissing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Bosch

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well was easy to install. Helps to keep the cold air from coming under the door. If the floor happens to be uneven this works because the bristles bend and don’t scrape . We would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: PK in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the project I needed the door sweep for
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the project I needed the door sweep for. Easy to install and is made well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cat

customer_reviews.title: Pemko Door Bottom Sweep
customer_reviews.text: I built a custom screen door for the front of my house and needed a sweep. Easily cut to size and simple to install. Works great. I pay for all of my items. I accept no discounts, trades or payment of any kind for my reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I have horizontal sliding garage doors and needed something to keep wind out that would work with uneven floor. This sweep was perfect, sturdy, easy to cut with a small hacksaw and installation took about 15 minutes total.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for irregular surfaces
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sweep to seal an irregular surface. I had tried the solid type sweep, but that left small gaps. This sweep and its fine bristles ensures a nice air tight seal.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: It works fine
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions and it installed perfectly...just what I needed on the basement storm door.
customer_reviews.author: Backyard Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, have had it up for a month-sturdy keeps out leaves and bugs.
customer_reviews.author: VM Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far this works great and no sign of breaking
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my rubber one that I have replaced 3 times now. So far this works great and no sign of breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Super easy fast install
customer_reviews.text: I've been meaning to buy this way before I actually got around to doing it. Glad I finally did. Does what it's supposed to do and was a super easy and fast install. Took about 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works great
customer_reviews.text: Well made and works great. I used it in a high traffic area and it is holding up well I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: rev don

customer_reviews.title: Cuts easily and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how easily this cut. Just used a hax saw a few strokes and it was cut. Just crimped the edge with some pliers and mounted it. Stops the light and any breeze coming through.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to seal off my patio door from mosquitos and insects. Installation was easy and the bristles are strong enough to keep everything out.
customer_reviews.author: paboothz71

customer_reviews.title: If you cut it to fit be sure to crimp the end.
customer_reviews.text: If you have to cut it be sure to crimp the end where you cut it or the bristles will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, Easy to install with a basic power drill to make pilot holes. Easy to cut to proper size for your door with basic hacksaw. Nothing difficult, keeps debris outside.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Golec

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sand out~
customer_reviews.text: We're in a sandy envirionment with an in swing screen door. Sand get's tracked in & I can use this like a broom before it gets too far. Width was exact for our standard size door.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C

customer_reviews.title: Don't get drafted !
customer_reviews.text: installs effortlessly and nearly eliminated drafts which can be a nuisance with hardwood floors . Also appreciate cut to fit option afforded by standard 36" length .
customer_reviews.author: mummee toe

customer_reviews.title: great sweep!
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the instructions in the bag and crimp the ends, the bristles will not fall out - did a great job sealing the garage man-door.
customer_reviews.author: Frankencar

customer_reviews.title: Works well as we expected it to. Keeps the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as we expected it to. Keeps the dust and sound outside out. Make sure to crimp or glue the end you trim or cut in order to keep the bristles from sliding out. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Colton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Door Sweeper
customer_reviews.text: It still wasn’t tall enough but once I added another 2" piece aluminum it worked out perfectly. Very happy so far. Let's wait until the first snowfall.
customer_reviews.author: George W Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with an interior door with no threshold, trying to keep out cooler air in other room.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says, works fine. Slightly harder to install than i originally expected but I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Austin S.

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to alter and ready to install
customer_reviews.text: This door sweep worked perfectly. It was easy to alter and ready to install. I used it on an outdoor screened-in porch that had slightly uneven flooring. This worked extremely well to provide the seal when closed yet the flexibility to vary when opening the door.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kamman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality door sweep. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Arey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to fill in a gap on my porch screen door. Very easy to install and works great!
customer_reviews.author: JWB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived danaged
customer_reviews.text: The product was already bent and misshapen when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Overton

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to cut and install
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a rubber door bottom seal on a mudroom exterior door that often feezes to the sill. I think this will solve that problem because it is not solid and is mounted on the inside of the door. But the thickness of the brush is not much of a barrier to cold or driving rain (can see through it) - it should keep out bugs, but time will tell if it is weatherproof enough. Making the brush thicker would improve this, but then it would create more drag on closig. Easy enough to cut and install.
customer_reviews.author: good or not

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and helps keep the dust out of our server room.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.A.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very much like those that you seen in commercial applications
customer_reviews.text: This door sweep works very well on the door between the kitchen and the garage. Very much like those that you seen in commercial applications.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe

customer_reviews.title: For Our Cold and Draught Old House
customer_reviews.text: I used to use these when I lived in Europe as a practical solution to removing draughts. However this type is really uncommon in the US. I was thrilled to find them - Had to cut them down to size to fit my old 1930s internal doors but that was easy and in 20 minutes my draught problem was gone. highly recommend as a really inexpensive solution to cold draught rooms!
customer_reviews.author: SAK

customer_reviews.title: No frills, just function
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking...just does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great at closing a fairly large draft. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Eyman Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Product seems well-made. The bristles could be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Product seems well-made. The bristles could be a bit more dense, but it made a noticeable difference in reducing the draft.
customer_reviews.author: r2

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was a little bigger than advertised, had to be cut down. seems to work "so so"
customer_reviews.author: Derik

customer_reviews.title: Prically door sweep
customer_reviews.text: I choose this door sweep for a few exterior door that mice had previously gotten through with the regular rubber sweeps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: GOOD AND EASY TO INSTALL,, price and quality is nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to block light on bottom of Darkroom door.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Goldflies

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish the product was offered in different finishes! Can be painted.
customer_reviews.author: GML

customer_reviews.title: Very good door sweep
customer_reviews.text: Very good door sweep!! Much better than cheap rubber and or plastic unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Just follow the directions cutting it to length or you will have broom bristles everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, keeps the leaves and dirt out of the garage, not sure about the mice yet
customer_reviews.author: S. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Much better that the vinyl strip type.
customer_reviews.text: Great to seal a door. Much better that the vinyl strip type.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product, poor packaging, had to file claim vendor sent new item, work very good!!
customer_reviews.author: Gene E. Heller

customer_reviews.title: strongly recommended
customer_reviews.text: works great, very good design, clear anodized finish adds to the protective finish that it has, really like it a lot
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that I was hesitant when my significant other suggested buying this Pemko Door Bottom Sweep. I am a very light sleeper and any light in the house that came through under the bedroom door would wake me on a nightly basis. The solution was buying this product. It has helped me to stay asleep soooo well and it still allows the air in the house to circulate. I'm very happy with this purchase. And able to sleep much more peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedyjoltJojo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good look and finish, easy install and cut. Covers the tiny gap on one side of my door, :)
customer_reviews.author: A Bains

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. Filled gap under wood screen door. Installed easily
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Easy to trim to size and works
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy to trim to size and works well
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Seefried

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep the smoke from going under the door ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to keep the smoke from going under the door easy to install doesn't bind up under door like rubber one did
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works.  Had to drill holes
customer_reviews.text: The ground outside my front door is slanted and the other sweeps don't work. This was perfect for that. Installed it on my storm door. The holes weren't even close to the holes for the door. But it was pretty easy to drill new holes.
customer_reviews.author: Random Person

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sweep couldn't even stop light or dust from coming through
customer_reviews.author: nathan miller

customer_reviews.title: helped block noise
customer_reviews.text: The door sweep helped us keep the noise level down after we had carpeting removed and installed wood flooring--the new wood floors meant the door "appeared" to be short. Adding this sweep did help. I wish it came in white to match the doors....
customer_reviews.author: Laurie E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Finally found a door sweep that works and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Finally found a door sweep that works and doesn't tear when you open and close your door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job - no thanks to the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The door sweep is fine. However, it was forced in to a box that was too small, so it was bent when it arrived. Shame because it was completely avoidable!
customer_reviews.author: LausieC

customer_reviews.title: but so far it's great!
customer_reviews.text: Only giving 4 star because just received it and put it on want to see how well it works. but so far it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I'll need to trim a couple inches off the end, but it looks like it will be perfect for my door.
customer_reviews.author: CBUESINGDC

customer_reviews.title: Door seal
customer_reviews.text: I am going to use this to seal the top of a roll up door, quality of the sweep looks good and should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rich S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality door sweep.
customer_reviews.text: Solid door sweep. I had to cut it to fit a pantry door that had a very large gap under the door.
customer_reviews.author: Brian with a Y.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Words just fine and when other types do not solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Use this one on the other side of the door and it works great together.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Keeney

product_meta.title: Pemko Door Bottom Sweep, Clear Anodized Aluminum with 1" Gray Nylon Brush insert, 0.25"W x 1.875" H x 36" L
product_meta.description: Material Type:AluminumBrush Door Sweeps are designed to seal the gap between the bottom of the door and the top of the threshold or floor surface. They are usually supplied with a flat flange. The flat flange provides the best contact between the brush and the threshold or floor surface
feature_bullets: All clear anodized brush products are supplied with gray brush (available with black brush upon request). Other finishes supplied with black brush.
All brush seals greatly reduce the infiltration of light, air, wind, rain, and snow; prevent heat loss; control the penetration of smoke and fumes.
Brush remains flexible down to -40°F and has a melting point above 400°F.
Nylon brush insert is designated by a undefinedNBundefined following the finish code.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
